THIS-759 Add graph diffing query methods to SelectQueries (#1317)

# Description

Adds graph diffing methods to SelectQueries class to support instance
diffing by comparing named graphs.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added
- Add get_triples_to_delete() method to find triples that exist in old
graph but not in new graph
- Add get_triples_to_add() method to find triples that exist in new
graph but not in old graph

---------

Co-authored-by: Andrian Gasper <andrian.gasper@cognite.com>
